mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT 1)) AS ROWNUM, A.DATASEQ, A.WORKDAILY_SEQ, LEFT(CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.WORKTIME_FROM,1,2),':',SUBSTRING(A.WORKTIME_FROM,3,4)),5) AS WORKTIME_FROM, LEFT(CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.WORKTIME_TO,1,2),':',SUBSTRING(A.WORKTIME_TO,3,4)),5) AS WORKTIME_TO, A.MANHOUR, A.PROD_QTY, (A.FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY + A.REWORK_GOOD_QTY) AS GOODSUM_QTY, A.FIRSTTIME_GOOD_QTY, A.FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY, A.REWORK_GOOD_QTY, A.REWORK_FAIL_QTY, A.NOTES, A.CREATOR, A.CREATETIME, A.EVENT, A.EVENTUSER, A.EVENTTIME, A.ISUSABLE, B.TID FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.ISUSABLE = 'Usable' AND WORKDAILY_SEQ = #{workdailySeq}
